fields.headline: News in brief
fields.bodyText: Health store Staying healthy on the road may be easier with the launch of www.miaonline.co.uk. The subscription site allows secure storage of medical, dental and opthalmological information for travellers taking multiple medicines. Topless in Spain Go topless on Spain's roads as well as its beaches by hiring one of a new range of cabriolets from Hertz (www.hertz.co.uk). They include the Alfa Romeo Spider, BMW Z4 and Mercedes SLK, and will be available in Madrid, Barcelona, Alicante and Malaga with prices from £189 a week. Welcome to Sarajevo A sure sign of an area opening up to tourism is the launch of a Bradt travel guide. The latest, ten years after the end of the Balkan war, is a guide to Bosnia & Herzegovina which costs £13.95. See www.bradt-travelguides.com.
